titleStmt.title: A pattern of mercy. Opened in a sermon at St. Pauls, before the Right Honorable, the Lord Mayor, and the Lord General Monck: February 12. 1659. / By Tobias Conyers, minister at St. Ethelberts, London.
titleStmt.author: Conyers, Tobias, 1628-1687.

titleStmt.title: A pattern of mercy. Opened in a sermon at St. Pauls, before the Right Honorable, the Lord Mayor, and the Lord General Monck: February 12. 1659. / By Tobias Conyers, minister at St. Ethelberts, London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.I. and are to be sold at the Grey-hound in St. Pauls Church-yard. at the Crown in Popes-head Alley, and at the Elephant and Castle near Temple Barr,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 27 1659"; the date has been crossed out. "1659 Feb: 27".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
